fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
South Korea to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Russia.
Free kick Russia.
Nestor Pitana signals a throw-in for Russia, close to South Korea's area.
Throw-in for South Korea at Arena Pantanal.
Ball safe as South Korea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea in their own half.
South Korea needs to be cautious. Russia have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Nestor Pitana awards Russia a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Russia.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?
South Korea's Heung Min Son breaks free at Arena Pantanal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Russia goal kick.
Throw-in South Korea.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Free kick Russia.
Heung Min Son for South Korea has been booked by Nestor Pitana and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Russia in their own half.
Goal kick for South Korea at Arena Pantanal.
South Korea to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Russia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside South Korea's half?
Russia have a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea in their own half.
Throw-in for South Korea in their own half.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Russia drive upfield and Aleksander Kokorin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a South Korea defender.
Aleksander Kokorin of Russia gets in a strike, but is off target.
South Korea have a goal kick.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Russia.
Sung Yueng Ki (South Korea) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match in Cuiaba is underway once more.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Cuiaba to check on Alexander Samedov, who is grimacing with pain.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Russia's Alexander Samedov is back in action after a slight knock.
Russia's Yury Zhirkov misses with an attempt on goal.
Nestor Pitana awards South Korea a goal kick.
Ja Cheol Koo (South Korea) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
South Korea have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
South Korea to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jeong Ho Hong for South Korea who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The match is underway again.
Jeong Ho Hong has recovered and rejoins the match in Cuiaba.
In Cuiaba South Korea attack through Heung Min Son. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Russia at Arena Pantanal.
Russia have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Russia close to the penalty box.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Corner awarded to South Korea.
Throw-in for Russia at Arena Pantanal.
South Korea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Russia to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
1 minutes will be added to the first half in Cuiaba.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Russia's Vasily Berezutskiy attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a South Korea goal kick.
Throw-in South Korea.
Free kick South Korea.
Oleg Shatov (Russia) has received a first yellow card.
Can South Korea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Russia's half?
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
South Korea push forward through Ja Cheol Koo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea in their own half.
Sung Yueng Ki of South Korea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
South Korea have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Chung Yong Lee (South Korea) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Russia have a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Russia in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea.
Myung Bo Hong is making the team's first substitution at Arena Pantanal with Keun Ho Lee replacing Chu Young Park.
South Korea's Young Gwon Kim is on target but unsuccessful.
South Korea to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Play has been resumed.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kook Young Han.
Kook Young Han is back on his feet again.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Capello (Russia) is making a first substitution, with Alan Dzagoev replacing Oleg Shatov.
Free kick South Korea.
South Korea's Jeong Ho Hong is on target but unsuccessful.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Russia drive forward and Dmitry Kombarov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Attention is being given to South Koreas Jeong Ho Hong and play has been suspended briefly.
Jeong Ho Hong is back on the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
Ball goes out of play for a South Korea goal kick.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Throw-in for Russia at Arena Pantanal.
Throw-in South Korea.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
South Korea take a 0-1 lead thanks to Keun Ho Lee.
Russia to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
South Korea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
South Korea to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Aleksandr Kerzhakov is on a sub for Yury Zhirkov for Russia.
Igor Denisov is replacing Denis Glushakov for Russia at Arena Pantanal.
Jeong Ho Hong (South Korea) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Seok Ho Hwang.
Aleksandr Kerzhakov gets an equalizer for Russia. The score is now 1-1.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Throw-in for South Korea close to the penalty box.
Free kick South Korea.
Corner awarded to South Korea.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Russia push forward at Arena Pantanal and Aleksander Kokorin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined South Korea defence.
Alan Dzagoev for Russia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nestor Pitana awards South Korea a goal kick.
Ball safe as South Korea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Myung Bo Hong is making the team's third substitution at Arena Pantanal with Bo Kyung Kim replacing Heung Min Son.
Throw-in for Russia at Arena Pantanal.
Goal kick for South Korea at Arena Pantanal.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to South Korea.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Russia to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a Russia throw-in in South Korea's half.
Aleksander Kokorin (Russia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for South Korea at Arena Pantanal.
Free kick Russia.
Igor Denisov (Russia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
South Korea's Ja Cheol Koo has been booked in Cuiaba.
4 minutes will be added to the second half.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Russia.
Russia's Alexander Samedov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
South Korea have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Cuiaba. The final score is 1-1.
